game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to its rightful place.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden deep within a forgotten temple. Locate it and bring it back to the quest giver.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the forgotten temple.
task.description: A local elder claims to have a map leading to the temple's entrance. Speak with them and obtain the map.

task.objective: Explore the temple and find the artifact.
task.description: Be cautious, the temple is said to be guarded by ancient traps and mystical creatures.
